findings.title: Incompatibility With Deflationary Tokens in MarginPool::transferToPool()
findings.description: The `transferToPool()` function in `MarginPool` contract is incompatible with deflationary tokens.

findings.title: A03.Inconsistent Expiry Check
findings.description: Inconsistent expiry check between `hasExpired()` and `_getMarginRequired()` functions in Controller contract.
